She's not into YOU, you mean. You cannot speak for another person.

I didn't know Nikki said she wasn't into white men. Did she really say that or are you making that up? Link please? Also, if she did say that, I'm sure she didn't use the word "honky" to describe them while doing so.

That's okay. These white females and gay males are HURTING on here! These women thought they had John Mayer in lock down I guess. That's funny.
+ExtremePIRANHA you also don't need to publicly speak on your sexual preferences in order to make sure you don't make anyone feel put down, that is, if you're a tactful person.

+GonnaMakeItAfterAll " what happened to him not liking black women??? backlash made you change your mind? or you're using Nicki to help fix your public image "

If he was going to use somebody, he would have done so a decade ago when he made the comments. If he wants to improve his image,he can find another black woman with a more respectable public image than Minaj.
+Grace Christian and you're part of the problem!!!

+Helen Lovejoy " LYING FOR ATTENTION. HE SAID BLACK WOMEN DID NOTHING FOR HIM! "

Okay, the only people I see who keep bringing this up are white women. I realize you all like John Mayer and you don't want him liking black women, so honestly you were thrilled when he made those comments almost a decade ago. You're not fooling anyone. I personally feel like people can and do change their views during the course of their lives. Some people change and grow which is what we all want to encourage. If he said racial things a decade ago and is now opening himself to different people, isn't that we want? Why condemn someone for being racist but then when they try to change their ways, you want them to stay in that same box? This is how I know you're not real, see.
+IAmaPersion "Hmm, somebody's feelings are hurt here. LOL And I'm talking about you, dummy.

+Jedi_Queen " You realize thugs can be white too, right? "

I have been a John Mayer fan for quite some time. When I heard about this, it kind of surprised me. Not so much that it was Nicki Minaj, I mean, I would love to have her in my direct messages, but the fact that John made a tweet about it. He has always been so private about who he dates, and we only hear about it because of the girls he was with was hurt by his actions. I think John is really at a different point in his life, and I am happy for him. 

I don't think that fan asked a personal question at all, and John shouldn't get offended if people want a personal answer (since he did tweet about Nicki). You make the decisions that determine if people know about your taste in women, or whom you find attractive. 

I think we will see these two (Nicki and John) collab on a song together in the future.
